subject: Automobile Racing
Awards, Decorations and Honors
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: With three top-five finishes and six top 10s in the first 19 races, David Ragan has surpassed his totals of two top fives and three top 10s of last year, when he finished 23rd in points.
snippet: With three top-five finishes and six top 10s in the first 19 races, David Ragan has surpassed his totals of two top fives and three top 10s of last year, when he finished 23rd in points.
